title: Bug 24835GTK: Multiple selection and right click in tree
description: Bug 24835GTK: Multiple selection and right click in tree Build 20021015LinuxGTKA right click on a multiple selection unselects everything and selects just theelement on which the right click was performed.1. Right click on a selected element.The element on which the right click was performed is selected (all otherelements are unselected).The context menu displayed contains the elements for the multiple selection.3. Select an action.The action is executed on the selected element only.A workaround to the problem is to use the right button with [CTRL] or [SHIFT]for create the selection.
SR: In the package view, select multiple elements (with [CTRL]+left button or[SHIFT]+left button)2.
